subject: College Athletics

Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: The same month that the former Penn State football coach Joe Paterno testified before a grand jury about Jerry Sandusky, he began negotiating with his superiors to amend his contract.
snippet: The same month that the former Penn State football coach Joe Paterno testified before a grand jury about Jerry Sandusky, he began negotiating with his superiors to amend his contract.
